segments.source_content:
- **Author**: Bruno Simon
- **Discount**: -50% (code [2022BLACKFRIDAY](https://threejs-journey.com/join/2022BLACKFRIDAY))

translations.en:
- **Auteur**: Bruno Simon
- **Réduction**: -50% (code [2022BLACKFRIDAY](https://threejs-journey.com/join/2022BLACKFRIDAY))
